name: Wolves (DEMO)
description:
Wolves have attacked the village. No one knows where they came from. No one knows if or when they will leave.

Rumors of witchcraft. Rumors of Satanic practices. Rumors of Forsaken Gods.

Who knows? And who cares? Certainly not the seven children holed up in a church on a hill, slowly running out of food and hope.

Still working on this. Actual gameplay coming soon. Feel free to point out mistakes or give feedback though.

Inspirations: Gods Will Be Watching, The Drifting Classroom, Sang-Froid - Tales of Werewolves, Parasite Eve, Lord of the Flies, This War of Mine
